alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 7:44PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oklahoma and southwest Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to icing on area roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Latest reports from Emergency Management Officials confirm that over two inches of snowfall have already fallen across portions of southeast Oklahoma with snow to continue through tonight.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
